scripts.start: npm run client-build && npm run server-start
scripts.build: npm run client-build && npm run server-build
scripts.clean: npm run client-clean && npm run server-clean
scripts.install: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.client-install: cd client && npm install && npm install --save-dev && cd ../
scripts.server-install: cd server && npm install && npm install --save-dev && cd ../
